person.persName: James Rodman (Franklin County, Kentucky, and Christian County, Kentucky, physician and asylum superintendent)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, and Christian County, Kentucky, physician and superintendent of Public mental health institutions. New Castle, Kentucky, native. Married to Henrietta Rodman. Father of Mary Rodman and Thomas Rodman. Graduated from the Medical Department of the University of Louisville in 1849. Physician in Frankfort, Kentucky, in 1850. Superintendent of the Feeble-Minded Institute from 1861 to 1863. Superintendent of the Western Lunatic Asylum of Kentucky from 1863 to 1889.
